name: S. R. Steel
overview:
Established in the year 2007, we, “S. R. Steel”, are engaged in Manufacturing, Supplying & Trading a broad array of Pipes, Tubes, Bars, Fittings & Flanges.

Our Products : Our range of products encompasses Industrial Fasteners-Industrial Washers, Industrial Fasteners-Industrial Nuts, Industrial Fasteners-Industrial Bolts, Seamless Steel Pipes, Welded Steel Tubes, Couplings, Buttweld Nipple, Buttweld Stub End & Butt Weld Elbow.

Our Manpower: We have recruited a dexterous team of professionals in our endeavor of providing a remarkable array of products. The dedicated, sincere and hardworking professionals working with us are masters of their respective fields of specialization.

Quality Assurance: We follow stringent TQM policies to offer quality-approved products to our customers. The range offered by us is manufactured using excellent quality stainless steel, copper, nickel, titanium and other material so that it is in tandem with international quality standards.

Our Products: Our valuable experience has enabled us to deliver the most cost effective industrial components to various industries that hold an authentic name in the market & are known for their exclusive quality.

Our Integrated Facilities”; We have established a state-of-the-art infrastructure facility at our premises for streamlined execution of the business process. Spread over a vast area, this facility is outfitted with latest machinery that helps in optimum utilization of resources thus, making our range cost-effective.
